BARS 2016

Paul Brest Hall, 555 Salvatierra Walk, Stanford, CA. 94305

Friday November 18, 2016

9:00AM - 5:45PM

The 2016 Bay Area Robotics Symposium aims to bring together roboticists from the Bay Area. The program will consist of a mix of faculty, student and industry presentations. For more details see the event schedule.
Registration is now closed. We had a record number of registrants (in just 5 days) and we reached capacity. However, the event will be live streamed **HERE** and all recorded talks will be posted after the event.
The program will feature:
  • Presentations from Stanford and Berkeley faculty
  • Talks from bay area industry representatives
  • Keynote talk by Stuart Russell.
  • Student poster session
Organizers: Marco Pavone (Stanford) and Anca Dragan (UC Berkeley)
Local arrangements: Marco Pavone and Ben Hockman (Stanford)
If you are interested in sponsoring this event, please contact the Symposium Co-organizer, Marco Pavone.
